name: Blazing Assassin
description:
Gameplay

Sneak quietly to get close to your target and pull the trigger. Once the alarm goes of, shoot your way back to the car and find the next target! Be careful not to make noise, if you get caught sneaking around the target will make a run for it.

You can also test your skills in endless mode and go for the highest score!

Dashing will make you invincible from bullets for a short period.

Controls:

WASD to move

Space to dash

Shoot with left mouse

Left shift to sneak

Tab to view target
